ComicInfo.Characters: Scooby-Doo,Nightwing [Dick Grayson],Batman [Bruce Wayne] (cameo at end),various members of The False Face Society,Fred,The Terrible Trio [The Shark, The Fox, and The Vulture],Shaggy,Daphne,Sphinx (monster),Black Mask,Sea-Lion (serpentine monster with a lion's head),Batgirl [Barbara Gordon],Velma,various parade marchers and spectators,Hippogriff (monster horse with the wings of an eagle)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:54:33 [Issue ID 4000-846941] urn:comicvine:4000-846941 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 02:06:33. [Issue ID 2239776]
ComicInfo.Summary: Monsters on Parade: With Batman on an undercover mission, Nightwing and Batgirl are left to protect Gotham City. When a "Monster Insurance" protection racket begins to threaten the city merchants, the younger bats press Mystery Inc. into service to assist in rooting out the perpetrators. The trail quickly leads to Black Mask and his False Face Society. But how will Black Mask make good on his threat to unleash a pack of monsters on the city during the annual Seaside Spectacle Parade, and how to differentiate the villainous legions of the False Face Society from the huge crowd of ordinary masked parade revelers?
ComicInfo.Tags: Scooby-Doo,Gotham City Police Department,Mystery,Shaggy,Going Bats,Velma Dinkley,Daphne Blake,Fred Jones,Dick Grayson,Gaggy,Batcave,Batman,Inc.,Joker
ComicInfo.Title: Monsters on Parade
